thread.title: Hearts will leave recruitment for in-coming coach- Joe Addo
thread.title_full: Hearts will leave recruitment for in-coming coach- Joe Addo

title: Hearts will leave recruitment for in-coming coach- Joe Addo
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 20:25 CET Hearts will leave recruitment for in-coming coach- Joe Addo - www.ghanasoccernet.com Joe Addo 
Hearts of Oak's Corporate Affairs manager Joe Addo has dismissed reports the club has opened negotiations towards signing players even before a substantive coach is appointed. 
The Phobians who are still in a hunt for a new coach have been linked with several players this off-season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us "Life is not about waiting for the rain to stop, but learning how to dance in the rain" By: Amma Dugan
